name: Call Of The Zombie
description:
Microphone required.
Headset recommended.

As a zombie, your goal is to find the human lurking about the manner. Zombies are blind though don't you know? So you'll have to groan like a zombie into your mic to visualize the environment! Don't groan too loud or too often though or you'll alert the guards!

As a human, your goal is simple. Survive! It's dark though so keep your light refilled by standing near candles.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2017 @ Facebook HQ.
